data.title: Road to the Olympics: The most important events ahead of Paris 2024
data.meta_description: Get a look at a sport-by-sport schedules highlighting the most important competitions preceding the 2024 Paris Olympic Games.
data.text:
If the Olympic Games is an athlete's Super Bowl, then the years of training and competing which precede that biggest of quadrennial events is their regular season. This is the time when the anonymous begin to make a name for themselves and those who are established on the world stage work to cement their legacies.

Every year, these athletes circle the globe to compete against their fiercest rivals, as they prepare for the Olympic Games.

Follow them as they travel their own unique paths on the road to the 2024 Paris Olympic Games with coverage on the networks of NBCUniversal and Peacock, including the U.S. Olympic Team Trials for track & field, swimming, gymnastics, diving and more.

And for the ultimate Olympic fans, we suggest you go deeper. Follow your favorite athletes through the elite competitions staged by the organizations which work to promote their sport each and every year.

The Olympic cauldron will be lit in Paris on July 26, 2024, and it’s these incredible athletes’ dream to be there.
